canonical_explanation.text: Food gives us energy to work and play. We eat different types of food like fruits, vegetables, grains, and milk. Some food comes from plants like fruits and vegetables. Some food comes from animals like milk and eggs. We should eat healthy food and avoid too much junk food. We eat three main meals every day - breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
rules: Food gives us energy to work, play, and grow.
Fruits, vegetables, grains, and milk are types of food.
Some food comes from plants, some from animals.
Healthy food like fruits and vegetables keeps us strong.
We eat breakfast, lunch, and dinner every day.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a fruit?
questions.explanation_correct: An apple is a fruit because it grows on a tree and has seeds inside it. Fruits are healthy foods that come from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A carrot is a vegetable that grows underground. Rice is a grain that we get from a plant. Milk is a dairy product that comes from animals like cows and goats. Only apples are considered fruits among these options.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a vegetable?
questions.explanation_correct: Carrot is a vegetable. Vegetables like carrots, tomatoes, and spinach come from plants. They are good for our health and help us grow strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mango, banana, and egg are not vegetables. Mango and banana are fruits, which come from plants. Egg is a food that comes from animals. Vegetables like carrots are healthy foods that come from plants.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a grain?
questions.explanation_correct: Rice is a grain, which means it is a type of food that comes from plants. Grains like rice, wheat, and corn provide us with energy to play and work hard.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apple, tomato, and milk are not grains. Grains are a type of food that comes from plants, like rice, wheat, and corn. Rice is the correct answer because it is a grain that gives us energy to play and work.

questions.question_text: Which food comes from plants?
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables come from plants, which is why the answer C is correct. Plants are living things that grow out of the ground and produce different kinds of food that we can eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk, eggs, and meat do not come from plants. They come from animals. Fruits and vegetables are the foods that come from plants, which is why option C is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: Which food comes from animals?
questions.explanation_correct: Milk comes from animals like cows, buffaloes, and goats. Milk is a healthy food that gives us energy and helps our bones and teeth grow strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice, spinach, and apples are foods that come from plants, not animals. Milk is the only option in the list that comes from animals like cows and buffaloes. Milk is a healthy food that helps us grow and play.

questions.question_text: Which animal gives us eggs?
questions.explanation_correct: Hens, which are female chickens, are the animals that give us eggs. We can get eggs from hens to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cows give us milk, not eggs. Goats also give us milk, not eggs. Dogs are animals that do not give us eggs. Hens, which are female chickens, are the animals that give us eggs that we can eat.

questions.question_text: Which food is healthy?
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits are healthy food because they have lots of vitamins and minerals that keep our body strong and healthy. Fruits like apples, oranges, and bananas are good for us to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Chips, candy, and cold drinks are not healthy food. They have a lot of sugar, salt, and fat which can make us sick if we eat too much of them. Healthy food like fruits, vegetables, and milk help us grow and have energy to play.

questions.question_text: Which of these is junk food?
questions.explanation_correct: Chips is junk food because it is made from potatoes and has a lot of unhealthy fats and salt. Junk food does not give us good energy to work and play like healthy foods do.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apple, milk, and rice are all healthy foods that give us energy to work and play. Chips is the only option that is considered junk food because it has a lot of unhealthy ingredients like fat and salt.

questions.question_text: What is the first meal of the day called?
questions.explanation_correct: Breakfast is the first meal of the day. We eat breakfast in the morning to get energy to start our day and play. Breakfast helps us feel strong and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Dinner is the last meal of the day, not the first. We eat dinner in the evening before going to bed. Breakfast is the first meal that we eat when we wake up in the morning.

questions.question_text: What is the meal we eat at night called?
questions.explanation_correct: The meal we eat at night is called dinner. This is because dinner is the last main meal of the day, which we have in the evening or at night before going to bed.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The meal we eat at night is called dinner, not breakfast, lunch, or morning meal. Breakfast is the first meal of the day, which we have in the morning. Lunch is the midday meal, and morning meal is just another name for breakfast.

questions.question_text: How many main meals do we eat in a day?
questions.explanation_correct: We eat three main meals every day - breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The correct answer is 3 main meals.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not eat only 1 or 2 main meals per day. We also do not eat 5 main meals per day. The correct number of main meals we eat every day is 3 - breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

questions.question_text: Which of these is yellow in color?
questions.explanation_correct: Bananas are yellow in color, which is why the answer B is correct. Bananas are a type of fruit that grows on trees.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apples, spinach, and tomatoes are not yellow in color. Bananas are a type of fruit that have a bright yellow skin when they are ripe and ready to eat. The correct answer is B, banana.

questions.question_text: We eat rice and roti. Where do they come from?
questions.explanation_correct: Rice and roti come from plants. They are made from grains that grow on plants like wheat and rice plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice and roti do not come from animals, water, or air. They are made from grains that grow on plants. Plants are the source of many foods we eat, like fruits and vegetables.

questions.question_text: Honey is sweet. Where does honey come from?
questions.explanation_correct: Honey comes from bees. Bees collect nectar from flowers and turn it into sweet honey that we can eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Honey does not come from cows, hens, or trees. Cows give us milk, and hens give us eggs. Trees give us fruits and leaves, but not honey. Honey is made by bees from the nectar they collect from flowers.

questions.question_text: Riya eats only chips and candy. Is this healthy?
questions.explanation_correct: No, eating only chips and candy is not healthy. We need to eat different types of healthy foods like fruits, vegetables, grains, and milk to get the energy and nutrients our body needs to grow strong and stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating only chips and candy is not healthy because it does not provide the balanced diet our body needs. Chips and candy have a lot of sugar and fat, but not enough vitamins, minerals, and other important nutrients. A healthy diet should include a variety of foods from different food groups to keep us energetic and fit.

questions.question_text: What should you drink to have strong bones?
questions.explanation_correct: Milk helps build strong bones and teeth. It has special nutrients like calcium that make your bones and teeth healthy and strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk is the best drink to have for strong bones. It has a special nutrient called calcium that helps build and strengthen your bones. Cold drinks, coffee, and tea do not have the nutrients that milk has to make your bones healthy.

questions.question_text: You wake up in the morning and feel hungry. What meal will you eat?
questions.explanation_correct: You will eat breakfast in the morning because that is the first meal of the day. Breakfast gives you energy to start your day and play with your friends.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You would not eat dinner in the morning because dinner is the last meal of the day, usually eaten in the evening. Lunch is also not the correct answer because that is the midday meal, eaten in the afternoon. The right answer is breakfast, which is the meal you eat when you wake up in the morning.

questions.question_text: Which fruit is red in color?
questions.explanation_correct: An apple is a fruit that is red in color. Apples are a healthy fruit that we can eat and they give us energy to play and work.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Bananas, oranges, and grapes are all different colors. Bananas are yellow, oranges are orange, and grapes can be green or purple. But apples are the fruit that is red in color. Apples are a healthy fruit that we can eat to get energy.

questions.question_text: Which vegetable is green?
questions.explanation_correct: Spinach is a vegetable that is green in color. Green vegetables are healthy and good for us to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrots, tomatoes, and potatoes are not green vegetables. Spinach is a green vegetable that is good for our health and helps us grow strong.

questions.question_text: Too many sweets are bad for your ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Too many sweets are bad for your teeth because they have a lot of sugar. Sugar can make your teeth get holes, which is called cavities. Eating too many sweets can hurt your teeth and make them unhealthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Sweets are not bad for your ears, hair, or eyes. Sweets can be enjoyed in moderation, but eating too many of them can cause problems with your teeth. Sweets have a lot of sugar, and sugar can make your teeth get holes, which is called cavities. That's why the correct answer is that too many sweets are bad for your teeth.

questions.question_text: Milk comes from ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Milk comes from cows. Cows are animals that give us milk, which is a healthy food that helps us grow strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk does not come from plants, hens, or fish. Milk is a special food that is made by cows. Cows are animals that live on farms, and they make milk for their baby cows to drink. That's why the correct answer is that milk comes from cows.

questions.question_text: Which of these is NOT a fruit?
questions.explanation_correct: Potato is not a fruit. Fruits grow on plants and trees, like mangoes, apples, and oranges. Potatoes grow underground and are a type of vegetable.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mangoes, apples, and oranges are all fruits because they grow on plants and trees. Potatoes are not fruits, they are a type of vegetable that grows underground. Fruits and vegetables are both healthy foods that we can eat, but they come from different parts of the plant.

questions.question_text: Eating fruits and vegetables makes us ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Eating fruits and vegetables makes us healthy because they have vitamins, minerals, and other nutrients that our body needs to grow strong and stay fit.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating fruits and vegetables does not make us weak, sick, or tired. These healthy foods give us energy to work and play. Fruits and vegetables are good for our body and help us stay healthy.

questions.question_text: The meal we eat in the middle of the day is called ___.
questions.explanation_correct: The meal we eat in the middle of the day is called lunch. This is because it is the main meal we have between breakfast and dinner.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Breakfast is the meal we eat in the morning, and dinner is the meal we eat in the evening. A snack is a small amount of food we eat between meals. The correct answer is lunch, which is the main meal we eat in the middle of the day.

questions.question_text: Roti is made from wheat. Wheat comes from ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Roti is made from wheat, and wheat is a plant. So the correct answer is that wheat comes from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Roti is made from wheat, which is a type of grain that comes from plants. It does not come from animals, water, or rocks. The correct answer is that wheat comes from plants.

questions.question_text: Which of these is orange in color?
questions.explanation_correct: Carrots are orange in color. This is why the correct answer is C) Carrot.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apples, bananas, and spinach are not orange in color. Carrots are the only food item from the options that is orange. This is why C) Carrot is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: Which food gives us energy to play?
questions.explanation_correct: All foods give us energy to play. The different foods we eat, like fruits, vegetables, grains, and milk, all provide energy for our bodies to use when we are active and playing.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Candy and water do not give us the energy we need to play. Candy has a lot of sugar, which can make us feel hyper for a short time, but it does not provide the long-lasting energy our bodies need. Water is important for our health, but it does not have the nutrients and calories that give us energy to be active and play.

questions.question_text: We get cheese and butter from ___.
questions.explanation_correct: We get cheese and butter from cows. Cows are animals that give us milk, and we use the milk to make cheese and butter.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cheese and butter do not come from hens, plants, or fish. Hens give us eggs, plants give us fruits and vegetables, and fish do not give us cheese or butter. The correct answer is that we get cheese and butter from cows, which are animals that give us milk.

questions.question_text: Which of these grows on trees?
questions.explanation_correct: Mangoes grow on trees, so the correct answer is C. Mangoes are a delicious fruit that comes from trees.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk, eggs, and cheese do not grow on trees. They come from animals like cows and chickens. Only fruits like mangoes grow on trees.

questions.question_text: Why should we not skip breakfast?

options.text: It gives us energy for the day

questions.explanation_correct: We should not skip breakfast because it gives us energy for the day. Breakfast is an important meal that helps us feel strong and healthy to play and learn.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Breakfast is very important for us because it gives us the energy we need to work and play all day long. We should not skip breakfast as it is a healthy meal that helps us stay energetic and feel good. Option B is the correct answer because breakfast is not bad for us, but instead gives us the energy we need.

questions.question_text: Apple is a fruit.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, an apple is a fruit. Fruits come from plants and they are sweet. Apples grow on trees and they are a healthy food for us to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: No, an apple is not a vegetable. Vegetables are also healthy foods that come from plants, but they are not sweet like fruits. Fruits like apples have seeds inside, while vegetables do not.

questions.question_text: Carrot is a fruit.
questions.explanation_correct: Carrot is a vegetable, not a fruit. Fruits come from the flowers of plants, while vegetables come from the roots, stems, or leaves of plants. Carrots grow underground as roots, so they are a type of vegetable.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrot is not a fruit. Fruits are usually sweet and grow on trees or vines, like apples, oranges, and grapes. Carrots are a type of vegetable that grows underground. They are crunchy and not as sweet as most fruits.

questions.question_text: Milk comes from cows.
questions.explanation_correct: Milk comes from cows. Cows are animals that give us milk, which is a very healthy food for us to drink.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk does not come from plants, it comes from animals. Cows are animals that give us milk, which is why the statement 'Milk comes from cows' is true. Milk is a healthy food that gives us energy and important nutrients.

questions.question_text: Eggs come from plants.
questions.explanation_correct: Eggs do not come from plants. Eggs come from chickens and other birds, which are animals. Plants like fruits and vegetables do not produce eggs.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eggs actually come from chickens and other birds, not from plants. Plants like fruits and vegetables grow on the plant, but they do not produce eggs. Eggs are made by animals like chickens.

questions.question_text: Fruits and vegetables are healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables are healthy because they have lots of vitamins, minerals, and fiber that are good for our body. They give us energy to play and study.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fruits and vegetables are not junk food. They are very healthy for us. They have important nutrients that help us grow strong and stay healthy. We should eat lots of fruits and vegetables every day.

questions.question_text: We should eat only junk food.
questions.explanation_correct: We should not eat only junk food. Junk food is food that is not healthy for us. We need to eat healthy food like fruits, vegetables, and milk to get the right energy and nutrients to grow strong and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating only junk food is not good for us. Junk food like chips, candies, and soda have a lot of sugar and fat that can make us sick. We need to eat a mix of healthy foods like fruits, vegetables, and milk to get the right energy and nutrients to grow strong and healthy.

questions.question_text: Breakfast is the first meal of the day.
questions.explanation_correct: Breakfast is the first meal of the day because we have not eaten anything since dinner the night before. Our body needs food to give us energy to wake up and start the day, so we eat breakfast in the morning.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Breakfast is not the last meal of the day. The last meal of the day is dinner, which we eat in the evening. Breakfast is the first meal we eat after waking up in the morning, to give us energy for the whole day.

questions.question_text: Drinking milk makes our bones strong.
questions.explanation_correct: Drinking milk makes our bones strong because milk has calcium, which is a special mineral that helps build strong bones and teeth.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Drinking milk does not make our bones weak. Milk has a special mineral called calcium that helps make our bones and teeth strong and healthy. Drinking milk is very good for us and helps us grow big and strong.

questions.question_text: Rice is a vegetable.
questions.explanation_correct: Rice is a grain, not a vegetable. Grains like rice, wheat, and oats come from plants, but they are not the same as vegetables like carrots, tomatoes, and spinach.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice is not a vegetable. Vegetables are parts of plants like leaves, stems, and roots that we eat, but rice comes from the seeds of a plant. So rice is a grain, not a vegetable.

questions.question_text: Honey comes from bees.
questions.explanation_correct: Honey comes from bees. Bees make honey from the nectar they collect from flowers. So the statement 'Honey comes from bees' is true.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Honey does not come from plants. It comes from bees. Bees collect nectar from flowers and make honey. So the statement 'Honey comes from bees' is true, not false.

questions.question_text: Apple and banana are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Apple and banana are fruits because they grow on plants. Fruits are healthy foods that come from plants, like apples, bananas, oranges, and berries.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apple and banana are not vegetables. Vegetables are different from fruits - they also grow on plants but have different shapes and tastes. The correct answer is 'fruits' because apples and bananas are round, sweet, and soft foods that come from plants.

questions.question_text: Carrot and potato are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Carrot and potato are both vegetables. Vegetables are a type of food that come from plants, not animals. Carrots and potatoes grow in the ground and are good for our health.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrot and potato are not fruits, they are vegetables. Vegetables are a type of food that come from plants, not animals. The correct answer is 'vegetables'. Fruits like apples and oranges are also from plants, but they grow on trees, not in the ground like carrots and potatoes.

questions.question_text: ___ gives us milk.
questions.explanation_correct: Cows give us milk. We can use the milk from cows to make things like yogurt, cheese, and butter.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cows, not other animals, give us milk. Cows have special parts inside called udders that produce milk. The milk from cows is an important food that provides nutrients for our bodies. The answer 'Cow' is the correct format to fill in the blank.

questions.question_text: ___ gives us eggs.
questions.explanation_correct: Hens are animals that lay eggs. That's why hens give us eggs to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cows do not give us eggs. Eggs come from hens, which are a type of bird. The correct answer is 'hen', which is the animal that lays the eggs we eat.

questions.question_text: The first meal of the day is ___.
questions.explanation_correct: The first meal of the day is called breakfast. We eat breakfast in the morning to get energy for the day. Breakfast helps us wake up and feel ready to play and learn.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is breakfast. Breakfast is the first meal we eat in the morning. It is not lunch or dinner. Breakfast gives us the energy we need to start the day and play and learn. We should always eat a healthy breakfast like fruits, milk, and cereal.

questions.question_text: We eat ___ at night.
questions.explanation_correct: We eat dinner at night because dinner is the main meal that we have in the evening before going to bed. Dinner gives us energy to rest and sleep well after a long day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer is 'dinner'. We have three main meals every day - breakfast in the morning, lunch in the afternoon, and dinner at night. Dinner is the meal we eat in the evening to end the day. So the correct answer is 'dinner'.

questions.question_text: Chips and candy are ___ food.
questions.explanation_correct: Chips and candy are junk food because they do not give us healthy energy. Junk food has lots of sugar, salt, and unhealthy fats which are not good for our body.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The missing word is 'junk'. Junk food means food that is not healthy for our body. Chips and candy are examples of junk food because they have a lot of sugar, salt, and unhealthy fats. We should eat them only sometimes, not every day.

questions.question_text: Fruits and vegetables are ___ food.
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables are healthy food because they give us many important vitamins and minerals that our bodies need to stay strong and healthy. Eating lots of fruits and vegetables is good for us.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'healthy'. Fruits and vegetables are foods that come from plants, and they are very good for our health. They have lots of vitamins, minerals, and fiber that our bodies need. Eating fruits and vegetables instead of junk food like chips or candy is the healthy choice.

questions.question_text: Rice and wheat are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Rice and wheat are grains. Grains are a type of food that come from plants. They give us energy to work and play.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The missing word in the sentence is 'grains'. Grains are a type of food that come from plants, like rice and wheat. They are not fruits, vegetables, or foods that come from animals.

questions.question_text: Fruits and vegetables come from ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables come from plants because they grow on trees, bushes, and other parts of plants. Plants provide the food that we eat, so the correct answer is 'plants'.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'plants'. Fruits and vegetables do not come from animals. They grow on different parts of plants like trees, bushes, and vines. The right answer should be written as 'plants'.

questions.question_text: Food gives us ___ to work and play.
questions.explanation_correct: Food gives us energy to work and play because it helps our body function properly. When we eat food, it gets converted into energy that we can use to move, think, and do activities.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'energy'. Food gives us energy to work and play because it helps our body function properly. We need energy to move around, think, and do activities. The answer should be in the exact format 'energy'.

questions.question_text: We eat ___ meals every day.
questions.explanation_correct: We eat three main meals every day - breakfast, lunch, and dinner. This is the right number of meals because our body needs food at different times to keep us energized and healthy throughout the day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'three' meals. Many people might think we eat two or four meals, but we actually eat three main meals - breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Our body needs food at different times during the day to give us energy to work, play, and be healthy.

questions.question_text: Put the meals in order from morning to night.
questions.explanation_correct: The order from morning to night is Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner. This is because we eat breakfast first in the morning, then lunch in the middle of the day, and finally dinner at night before going to bed.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The order from morning to night should be Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner. Dinner should come after Lunch because we eat dinner in the evening, after we have had our lunch during the day.

questions.question_text: Put in order: How we get milk.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is: Cow eats grass, Cow gives milk, We drink milk. This is the right order because the cow eats grass, which helps it make milk, and then we can drink the milk that the cow gives us.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be: Cow gives milk, We drink milk, Cow eats grass. This is wrong because the cow first needs to eat grass to make milk, and then we can drink the milk. The order should be Cow eats grass, Cow gives milk, and then We drink milk.

questions.question_text: Put in order: Eating an apple.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is Wash apple, Eat apple, Throw the core because you need to wash the apple first to make sure it's clean, then you can eat the apple, and finally you can throw away the core once you've finished eating.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Eat apple, Wash apple, Throw the core. This is not correct because you should always wash the apple before eating it to make sure it's clean. After eating the apple, you can then throw away the core.

questions.question_text: Put in order: Having dinner.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is: Wash hands, Eat food, Thank for food. This is the right order because we need to wash our hands before eating to keep them clean, then we can enjoy the food, and finally we should thank for the food we have.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be: Eat food, Wash hands, Thank for food. This is not the right order because we should always wash our hands before eating, not after. And we should thank for the food after we have eaten, not before.

questions.question_text: Put in order: From plant to food.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is 'Plant grows, Fruit is ready, We eat fruit' because this shows how the process works - first the plant grows, then the fruit becomes ready, and finally we eat the fruit.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be 'Fruit is ready, We eat fruit, Plant grows'. This is wrong because it doesn't show the full process - the plant has to grow first before the fruit can become ready, and then we can eat the fruit.
